author: Thomas Bristow
title: Luis Enrique changes up Barcelona training with bizarre drill with star players away on international duty
text:
Luis Enrique changes up Barcelona training with bizarre drill with star players away on international duty The Barca boss oversaw the drill with a very cool pair of shades Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Luis Enrique tries something new in training Share this video Get FC Barcelona   
The international break can be a tough time for those not selected. Not only do you have to wave goodbye to your teammates, you also have to suffer the absence of league football like everybody else. 
With no Neymar, Luis Suarez, Lionel Messi or even Gerard Pique to take part in training, Luis Enrique has been left with slim pickings. 
Which is perhaps why the Barcelona boss has changed up training at Barcelona by introducing a very bizarre drill. Barcelona's new drill (Photo: FC Barcelona/Youtube) 
As seen in the above video, Barcelona's recruits must do keepy-uppies through a series of cones before kicking the ball into a very large basketball hoop. Luis Enrique watches on like a baller (Photo: FC Barcelona/Youtube) 
The drill draws comparisons with videos posted by footballers who have attempted basketball trick shots with their feet. Firmino filmed himself doing one such stunt.
